Uses of Package
jSimPack

Packages that use jSimPack
jSimPack A discrete event simulator 
simulator.elevatorcontrol Contains classes that manipulate the simulated environmental objects. 
simulator.elevatormodules Provides sensors for detecting car position, door position, and door reversal triggers, and actuators for turning on button lights moving the doors. 
simulator.framework Provides the core infrastructure for simulating the network and elevator. 
simulator.framework.faultmodels   
simulator.framework.faults   
simulator.payloads The message types that can be sent on the simulated network. 
 

Classes in jSimPack used by jSimPack
BreakpointListener
          Implement this class to register and respond to breakpoints in the future event list.
FutureEvent
          Data object that encodes event information.
FutureEventList
          Dispatches abstract events that occur at discrete points in time.
FutureEventListener
          Receives notification when events are released from a FutureEventList.
RandomSource
          Wrapper class for Random that lets us manage the random seed.
SimTime
          This class offers a units-aware represenation of simulation time.
SimTime.SimTimeUnit
